title: Spaghetti with sausage and tomato
directions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions until al dente.
Meanwhile, remove the skin from the sausages. Heat a frying pan or large frying pan and fry the meat in 3 min. Browned. Break the while with a spatula into pieces.
Chop the onion. Scrape the carrots and cut into small cubes. Cut the celery into small cubes. Add the onion, carrot and celery to the meat and cook for 5 min. With
Cut the red pepper finely and add. If necessary, first remove the seeds for a less spicy dish. Add the tomato, a splash of water, herbs or salt and simmer for 3 minutes. Simmer.
Halve the cherry tomatoes. Spoon the sauce and cook for 1 min. Serve the spaghetti with the sauce.
